tool.name: CoNIFER CNVs caller
tool.command: python \${CONIFER_PATH}/conifer.py call --input $input --output temporary --threshold $threshold 2>&1 && awk '{print \$2,\$3,\$4,\$5,\$1}' OFS="\t" temporary > $outputFile
tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool is a CNVs caller using SVD-ZRPKM thresholding.
